official-title.#text:
To implement a demonstration project under titles XVIII
		  and XIX of the Social Security Act to examine the costs and benefits of
		  providing payments for comprehensive coordinated health care services provided
		  by purpose-built, continuing care retirement communities to Medicare
		  beneficiaries.
